column5: has anyone fished fly in with white river air on cornish or bulldozer lake. possible trip end of june,
I have flown with them twice going to lake kaby. Very happy with their service. Also cannot say enough good things about Watson's Kaby Lodge. Tom and Michel are great.

Flew into a few of there lakes including Bulldozer. We could not get into the lake we wanted this year so we are using Air Dale. If your getting a real good deal it might be worth it but there are better lakes/amenities. White River is a top notch outfit but some lakes are so-so.
